layout.name: name
layout.title: Name
layout.tooltip: The name of the white hole. Used to select the destination of a white hole.

layout.name: dest
layout.title: Destination
layout.tooltip: The destination of the warp. If multiple white hole with the same name are found, the warp will take you to the closes white hole. If no destination is placed, it will take you to the nearest white hole regardless of the name

layout.name: deadly
layout.title: Deadly Mode
layout.tooltip: If checked, the wormhole will destroy instead of teleporting

layout.name: pushforce
layout.title: Push Force
layout.tooltip: The amount of push and pull the hole does. Set to 0 to disable

layout.name: scanPlayer
layout.title: Allow Players
layout.tooltip: If checked, the wormhole will scan for players to be warped

layout.name: scanNPC
layout.title: Allow NPCs
layout.tooltip: If checked, the wormhole will scan for NPCs to be warped

layout.name: scanBlock
layout.title: Allow Blocks
layout.tooltip: If checked, the wormhole will scan for blocks to be warped
